General.Name: Autek China Inc
General.Description: Autek China Inc. provides eye health and myopia prevention, and control technology and services in China. It operates through Ophthalmology and Optometry Medical Equipment; and Ophthalmology Service segments. The company offers rigid contact lenses including orthokeratology lenses and supporting care products. It engages in the provision of technical services, development, consultation, exchange, transfer and promotion activities; and sale of second-class medical devices, lighting appliance and electronic products, optical instrument disinfectants, glasses, and daily necessities. In addition, the company offers health consultation services; sale of prepackaged foods; and engages production, wholesale, and retailing of drugs, as well as provides inspection and testing services. Autek China Inc. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Hefei, China.
General.Address: No. 4899 Wangjiang West Road, Hefei, China, 230088
